title: Restart client ???
body: Lately i have been getting these pop ups randomly in my client telling me to restart... Its getting pretty annoying as it had just popped up during a ranked champ select and I couldn't choose a champion... Anyway to fix this?

replies.body: That's the client's way of letting you know that some of your game files are missing/damaged/corrupted, and there was a pretty good chance that you would have crashed in that match regardless. By shooting this error, the client was trying to repatch itself in order to fix those files. If the client keeps doing this over and over you may need to try forcing this patch manually by using our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) with the option **force repatch** turned on.
